title: Introduce Yourself
description: Print your name on the first line and your favorite hobby on the second line.

title: Game Character Stats
description: Create three variables: `character_name` with the value "Wizard", `mana` with a value of 200, and `has_hat` with a value of True. Print each variable on a new line.

title: Grade Calculator
description: Given a variable `score = 85`, print 'A' if the score is 90 or above, 'B' if it's 80 or above, and 'C' otherwise.

title: Find the Even Numbers
description: Write a `for` loop that prints all the even numbers from 2 to 10 (inclusive), each on a new line.

title: Area of a Rectangle
description: Write a function `calculate_area` that takes `width` and `height` as arguments and prints the area. Call it with a width of 10 and a height of 5.

title: Accessing Inventory
description: You are given a list `inventory = ['compass', 'map', 'rope']`. Print the second item in the list.
